metaKeywords: animation, cartoon, gift, souvenir, wedding, party, social event, caricature, animated invitation, custom-made cartoon
metaDescription: SuperConejo is a studio of 2D animation. We design and produce characters and animated cartoons. We help companies and people communicate what they need in a clear, fun and artful manner. We are a group of young but experienced illustrators, animators, script writers, graphic designers, sound designers, musicians and voice actors ready to work.
metaTitle: SuperConejo tailored animated cartoons: infographs, wedding gifts, e-cards, institutional communication
textoQueEs: SuperConejo is a studio of 2D animation. We design and produce characters and animated cartoons. We are a group of young but experienced illustrators, animators, script writers, graphic designers, sound designers, musicians and voice actors ready to communicate what you need in a clear, fun and artful manner. At SuperConejo we work in a certain way that allows you to have a direct contact with us in every single stage of the project.
presentacionTexto: Hi there. We are an Animation Studio based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. We produce animated cartoons and all sort of 2D animations for Institutional Communication, Weddings and social events in general and Mobile Videogames. Our high-performance team is formed by illustrators, animators, script writers and sound designers who will produce what you need, in the aesthetic style that suits best for your campaing
enterateComo: This is how we work for weddings, bar/bat mitzva and corporate events
granRegalo: Awesome gifts make you look awesome
tenemosOtros: if you don like them we have others
investigacionTexto: It is essential for us to keep abreast to the technologies and innovations that are constantly in the areas we practice. That means that we are constantly evolving and that we, as individuals, have increasingly tools. Also we pleasurely go over the different paths of art that continually leave their mark. By default we get a product that is always at the height of the times.
involucramientoTexto: Our scheme of work allows us to understand and interpret the needs and goals of each client. It is the most important part of our work and is what allows that in many cases we manage to exceed expectations. We value every customer motivation and help focus a north on each idea.
ideasTexto: To succeed in what we do, we find it essential to combine the previous two points with that 'special touch' that characterizes us. The development of ideas and creative process is different for every need and it challenges us to think multi-laterally in every detail. Our sense of humor and sensitivity for sympathy help us to clarify the client's wishes. From the initial brainstorming to the development of the concept and its implementation we cross through many good ideas.
ultimosComunicacionTextos: Our latest works for different companies or institutions
textoVJLinea1: Cartoons and animations for mobile and desktop videogames
textoVJLinea3: We give life to your ideas
textoFiestas1: Animated Cartoon, custom-made, on a giant screen. Have you ever thought of telling your story in the most hillarious and original way? You can surprise everyone at the party with the best gift. One that will always remain as a wonderful reminder of the joyful moment you lived
H3intro1: SuperMotivation: We always loved cartoons as well as video games; it made us to form in careers that somehow or another, directly or indirectly, were related to, from artistic activity, design, programming, professional audio and video production, advertising creativity, music, acting and script. So 12 years ago we began this project for living doing what we love.
H3intro2: SuperAchievements: Our goal is clear; create quality content on video for any corporate or social need, and bring people a product of excellent termination. We offer a service tailored to anyone and we get involved in each case for that to be noted in the result. We have more than 600 happy customers in Argentina and around the world.
H3intro3: SuperProjection: In addition to continue growing and enlarging the team, we are currently working on developing content for mobile and web applications, while maintaining our signature style and our way of working fluid, and always attentive to new technologies coming to give us it's facilities.
marcasTitulo: These are a few of the companies we worked with:
formu_ok:
Thank you.
We will get back to you shortly
separadorClimaco: Climaco's Journey was co production with a colombian game studio. We developed the demo in 2 weeks.
